#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define ld long double
#define f(i,n) for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
int main() 
{
	
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{   int occ[100];
	    f(i,100) occ[i]=0;
		
		int n; cin>>n; int c[n];
		f(i,n) {cin>>c[i]; occ[c[i]-1]++;}
		f(i,100) { if(occ[i]==1) {cout<<i+1<<endl; break;}}
	}
	return 0;
}
